sections.body: All of a crystal dragon's natural attacks deal slashing damage.
sections.name: Razor Sharp

sections.body: An ancient crystal dragon's scales reflect ray spells back upon the ray's source if the ray fails to overcome the dragon's spell resistance.
sections.name: Ray Reflection

sections.body: A great wyrm crystal dragon radiates an aura of scintillating color from its jeweled scales to a radius of 60 feet. All within this area must make a Will save each round to avoid being stunned (if the victim has 15 or fewer Hit Dice) or confused (if the victim has more than 15 Hit Dice) for 1 round. The save DC is equal to the dragon's breath weapon save DC. This is a mind-affecting effect. The dragon can activate or suppress this aura as a free action.
sections.name: Scintillating Aura

sections.body: A crystal dragon gains the following spell-like abilities, usable at will (unless indicated otherwise) upon reaching the listed age category. Very young—color spray; Juvenile—glitterdust; Adult—rainbow pattern; Old—stone to flesh (3/day); Ancient—prismatic spray (3/day); Great wyrm—imprisonment (1/day).
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: Crystal dragons do not gain tremorsense until juvenile age (30 ft.), improving at adult (60 ft.) and old (120 ft.).
sections.name: Tremorsense
